addressee_email.__description: The email address that will be RECEIVING all the automated emails by the project.

sender_email.__description: The email address that will be SENDING all the automated email by the project. You must have acsess to this email account!

item_shop_api.__description: Please choose one of the following api's to use in all the scripts that import item shop info.

fortniteapi.com.__description: This api is open for everyone, and does not require a key to use.

fnbr.co.__description: This api needs a key. Much more stable and quick then the free one. to get a key, visit http://fnbr.co/api/docs
